function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Change in city soundscape due to COVID-19 containment measures","Impact":"Loss of familiar sounds and social ambience, creating an eerie and uncanny atmosphere","Mitigation":"Enhance public health measures to allow for safe return of people to the city","Technologies":"Smart city monitoring systems, public health surveillance technologies","People":"City residents, urban dwellers","Owner":"City authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Absence of people in the city due to containment measures","Impact":"Reduction in social interaction, economic activity, and vibrancy of the city","Mitigation":"Implement vaccination and testing strategies to safely reintroduce people to public spaces and gatherings","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution technologies, testing facilities, contact tracing apps","People":"City residents, business owners, tourists","Owner":"Health authorities, city governments"},{"Description":"Structural and political questions arising from the quietness of the city","Impact":"Revelation of inequalities, access to public spaces, and urban planning challenges","Mitigation":"Address structural inequalities and urban planning issues to create inclusive and accessible public spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning software, community engagement platforms","People":"Marginalized communities, urban planners, policy makers","Owner":"City governments, community organizations"}]}
